title: Aromaman Beard Care All-Natural Hand Crafted Beard Oils, Balms and Beard Brush. Choose your scent and size
description: Are you bearded? Does it need to be tamed? Wary of store bought stuff that contains unknown chemicals?  Aromaman Beard Care Combo Sets, just in time for beard weather!   The 1+1 Set Includes One Each of the Following Items:  - 1 ounce Beard Oil in a Green PET Plastic Bottle w/easy pour pop lid.  - 1 ounce Beard Balm in a Round Tin w/ a Screw-top  - Beard Brush  The 2+2 Set Includes One Each of the Following Items:  - 2 ounce Beard Oil in a Blue PET Plastic Bottle w/easy pour pop lid.   - 2 ounce Beard Balm in a Round Tin w/ a Screw-top  - Beard Brush  All Beard Oils contain a base carrier oil blend of Hemp, Fractionated Coconut, Grapeseed and Jojoba to deliver much needed Vitamin E to the skin and hair. This conditions, softens, and relieves any itch/flakiness of the skin and hair.  Scent Choices are:  Earth - Patchouli, Frankincense, and Sandalwood. Citrus - Grapefruit, Lemon, Sweet Orange, Lime, and Tangerine. Mint - Tea Tree, Peppermint, and Eucalyptus. Autumn - Nutmeg, Cinnamon, Ginger, Clove, and Cardamom. Bay Lime - Bay, Lime, Sandalwood, and Rosemary. Lumberjack - Raw Leather Musk, Cedarwood, and Fir. Natural/Unscented.  All Balms contain wax and shea/cocoa butter (naturally refined, deodorized) mixture and infused with hair-healthy oils.  Oils also double as a shave oil. It's a very healthy alternative to chemical filled shaving creams and aftershaves.  Take a dab, rub it between your hands and massage into facial hair. You'll love the shine, feel and smell of your beard.  I stand behind my products. They are All-Natural and chemical free.   *** THE BALMS ARE NOT MEANT TO BE LEFT UNATTENDED IN A HOT MAILBOX. WAX + HEAT = LIQUID. LET THEM COOL BEFORE OPENING ***
